entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
